bibl.title: More Texts from the Archive of Socrates: Papyri from House 17, Level B, and Other Locations in Karanis (P. Cair. Mich. III)

series.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete – Beihefte

bibl.seg: Mohamed Gaber El-Maghrabi & Cornelia Römer (edd.), More Texts from the Archive of Socrates. Papyri from House 17, Level B, and Other Locations in Karanis (P. Cair. Mich. III) = ArchPF. Beiheft. 45.
Berlin - Boston, W. de Gruyter, 2021, xviii-214 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-11-071428-9. €99,95.

P. Cairo Mich. III, 1-33. - Introduction. - A. Literary texts from House B17 and its environment (1-7). - B. Documentary texts from House B17 (8-26). - C. Documents from other locations in Karanis (27-30). - D. Semi-literary texts from House B17 and its environment. - Bibliography. Indexes.
C.R. par C. Michael Sampson, BMCRev <https://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2022/2022.05.09>. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 59 (2022) pp. 397-405.
